data.name: Online Adult Content Manager - Local Content Manager
data.detailed_description:
Local Content Manager DLC allows you to access all your content that is stored locally on your computer! Whether its videos, images, games or anything else; it can all be organized and accessed with this exciting addon!

All URL input fields now have the capability to access any file or folder that you have on your PC! Clicking the Open button will open that file or folder! Organise and have quick access to any file or folder on your PC!

Exclusive to the Local Content Manager DLC is the Image & Video player! Play your videos or go through your images all within the app without ever opening any external programs!

Video File Compatibility:
  • .wmv (Windows)
  • .asf (Windows)
  • .avi (Windows)
  • .dv (Windows & MacOs)
  • .m4v (Windows & MacOs)
  • .mov (Windows & MacOs)
  • .mp4 (Windows & MacOs)
  • .mpg (Windows & MacOs)
  • .mpeg (Windows & MacOs)
  • .ogv (Windows, MacOs & Linux)
  • .vp8 (Windows, MacOs & Linux)
  • .webm (Windows, MacOs & Linux)

Image File Compatibility:
  • .jpg
  • .png

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Storage: 130 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Will more than likely work on requirements less than this.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Storage: 130 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Will more than likely work on requirements less than this.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Storage: 130 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
